lines.text: For Megan! The time has come.
[Gets knocked to the floor by the flung keys]

[Looking down at the dazed chief]
Nice shot

[Roaring]
STUPID MORONS... YOU WERE NOT SUPPOSED TO TAKE ACTION... DON'T YOU KNOW WHAT THE WORD PEACEFUL MEANS?
But chief you don't understand, they were throwing tin cans at bonnapart
THEY THROW TIN CANS... AND YOU BLOW UP THE CITY?
RIGHT LET'S BLOW THOSE BITCHES AWAY
Whatever happens, Leona... Let Justice always win!

[after a crash]
I bit my tongue...
